APPLICATION_FORM.TITLE: Application form
APPLICATION_FORM.DRAG_AND_DROP_INFO: You can move the table items by dragging them with the handle on the left side.

TYPES.FROM_FEDERATION_SHOW: Input text field pre-filled from external source
TYPES.FROM_FEDERATION_HIDDEN: Hidden input text pre-filled from external source
TYPES.COMBOBOX: Single value selection with opt. custom value

WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.HEADER: Item is used to display customizable heading of form. Can have any HTML content.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.SUBMIT_BUTTON: Button used to submit the form with custom label. All other form items are checked on valid input before submission. If it fails, form is not sent.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.HTML_COMMENT: Item is used to display custom HTML content anywhere on form. Useful for explanation descriptions, dividing parts of form etc.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.TEXTFIELD: Editable text field useful to gather short text input, e.g. name, phone.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.FROM_FEDERATION_SHOW: Non-editable and visible form item. Form is submitted even on invalid input ! Useful to automatically gather information provided by AUTH mechanism (IdP federation, certificate).
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.FROM_FEDERATION_HIDDEN: Non-editable and hidden form item. Form is submitted even on invalid input ! Useful to automatically gather information provided by AUTH mechanism (IdP federation, certificate).
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.VALIDATED_EMAIL: Special text field to gather and verify user`s email address. Input is checked on email address format. If user enters new value, then validation email is sent. Application then can't be approved unless provided email address is validated.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.SELECTIONBOX: Simple selection box with defined custom values that user can choose.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.USERNAME: Special text field to gather user`s login. It checks login availability on user input.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.PASSWORD: Two password fields to gather user`s new password. Input is never displayed. User must type same password in both fields.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.TEXTAREA: Editable text area useful to gather longer text input with linebreaks, e.g. comments, SSH key
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.COMBOBOX: Selection box with defined custom values and one special option: "--custom value--", which allows users to input own text (as simple text field).
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.CHECKBOX: List of defined custom options with checkboxes. Selected values are gathered as comma separated string.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.RADIO: List of defined custom options with radio buttons. Single selection model. Value is stored as string.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.TIMEZONE: Selection box with pre-defined values of UTC timezones.
WIDGET_DESCRIPTION.AUTO_SUBMIT_BUTTON: Button used to auto-submit the form with custom label. All other form items are checked on valid input before submission. If validation fail (at least once) user must submit form manually. If it's OK, then form is automatically submitted.

CREATE_VO.TITLE: Create organization
CREATE_VO.TOOLTIP: Short name and full name have to be filled and valid
CREATE_VO.FILL_FULL_NAME: Length of full name has to be between 1 to 128 characters
CREATE_VO.FILL_SHORT_NAME: Length of short name has to be between 1 to 32 characters, allowed characters are a-z, A-Z, 0-9, ., _, -

REMOVE_VO.TITLE: Remove organization
REMOVE_VO.FORCE_WARNING: Using force also deletes all groups, members and resources of selected organizations.

INVITE_MEMBER.TITLE: Invite member
INVITE_MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: The person you are inviting will receive an email with a link to VOs application form. You can set up an email template in: Vo manager (advanced) -> Application form -> Notifications.
INVITE_MEMBER.NAME: Name
INVITE_MEMBER.SUCCESS: Invite was send to given email

DELETE_GROUP.TITLE: Confirm delete action
DELETE_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Following groups (including all sub-groups) will be deleted.

REMOVE_MEMBERS.TITLE: Confirm removal
REMOVE_MEMBERS.DESCRIPTION:
Following members will be removed from VO and their settings will be lost.

You can consider changing their status to "DISABLED", which will prevent them from accessing VO resources.
REMOVE_MEMBERS.DESCRIPTION_GROUP: Following members will be removed from group. They will lose access to resources provided by this group.

REJECT_APPLICATION.TITLE: Specify reason
REJECT_APPLICATION.TEXT: Please specify reason of rejection to let user know why was application rejected.

DELETE_APPLICATION_FORM_ITEM.TITLE: Delete confirm
DELETE_APPLICATION_FORM_ITEM.INFO_1: Deleting of form items is NOT RECOMMENDED!
DELETE_APPLICATION_FORM_ITEM.INFO_2: You will loose access to data users submitted in older applications within this form item!

APPLICATION_FORM_COPY_ITEMS.TITLE: Copy form items from VO / group
APPLICATION_FORM_COPY_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: All form items will be added to yours.

APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.TITLE: Edit form item
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.SHORT_NAME_DESCRIPTION: Internal item identification (used as fallback when you forgot to set "Label" for some language).
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.INPUT_WIDGET_DESCRIPTION: Specify what input widget is used for this item.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.DISPLAY_ON_APPLICATION_DESCRIPTION: Define on which application types is this item displayed.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.CONTENT_DESCRIPTION: HTML formatted content of form item. It spans through all columns to full form width.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.LABEL: Label
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.LABEL_DESCRIPTION: Label displayed to users to identify item on application form. If empty, "Short name" from basic settings is used as fallback.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Help text displayed to user along with input widget.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.ERROR_DESCRIPTION: Error message displayed to user when enters wrong value.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.REGEX_DESCRIPTION: Regular expression used for item value validation (before submitting by user).
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.SOURCE_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTION: Select attribute, which will be used to pre-fill form value. You can select also VO attributes.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.DESTINATION_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTION: Select attribute, where will be submitted value stored after accepting user`s application.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.FEDERATION_ATTRIBUTE_DESCRIPTION: Select federation attribute to get pre-filed value from.
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: If checked, user can`t submit empty value (doesn't apply to non-editable fields).
APPLICATION_FORM_EDIT_ITEM.OPTIONS_DESCRIPTION: Define possible options for selection in SELECTIONBOX, COMBOBOX, CHECKBOX, RADIO widget. Empty options are not used.

APPLICATION_FORM_DELETE_MAIL.TITLE: Confirm delete action
APPLICATION_FORM_DELETE_MAIL.DESCRIPTION: Following mail definitions will be removed and users won't receive them anymore.

CREATE_ATTRIBUTE.ERROR_EMPTY_VALUE: You can't save attribute with empty value

DELETE_RESOURCE_TAG.TITLE: Confirm delete action
DELETE_RESOURCE_TAG.DESCRIPTION: Following tags will be deleted and won't be used to tag VO resources.

NOTIFICATIONS_EDIT_FOOTER.TITLE: Edit mail footer
NOTIFICATIONS_EDIT_FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: This text will be added as footer for all email notifications (replacing {mailFooter} tag in mail definition).
NOTIFICATIONS_EDIT_FOOTER.LABEL: Footer text

NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.EMAIL_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_CREATE: Selected type of notification (action which trigger sending and who is notified).
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.EMAIL_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_EDIT: Type of notification (action which trigger sending and who is notified).
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPLICATION_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_CREATE: Select which application type will trigger sending.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPLICATION_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_EDIT: Application type which will trigger sending.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.SENDING_ENABLED_DESCRIPTION: If checked, notification will be sent. Un-check it to temporary disable sending.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.SUBJECT: Subject
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.TAGS_DESCRIPTION: Following tags can be used in mail's subject and text and are replaced by actual data on sending. Just choose place where you want tag and click on tag button. When no data for tag is found, it's replaced by whitespace.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.ACTOR_DESCRIPTION: user's login used when submitting application
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.EXTSOURCE_DESCRIPTION: user's identity provider when submitting application
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.VONAME_DESCRIPTION: name of VO of application form
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.GROUPNAME_DESCRIPTION: name of group, if application form is for group membership
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.MAILFOOTER_DESCRIPTION: common mail footer defined by VO
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.ERRORS_DESCRIPTION: errors description, what happened while processing new application. Useful for VO administrators
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.CUSTOMMESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: optional message passed by administrators when rejecting an application
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.FIRSTNAME_DESCRIPTION: users first name taken from application form or Perun
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.LASTNAME_DESCRIPTION: users last name taken from application form or Perun
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.DISPLAYNAME_DESCRIPTION: users display name taken from application form or Perun
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.MAIL_DESCRIPTION: users preferred mail from application form or Perun
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.PHONE_DESCRIPTION: users phone from application form or Perun
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.LOGINNAMESPACE_DESCRIPTION: user's login in selected namespace, taken from registration form or Perun. You MUST specify the namespace, e.g. {login-einfra} will print user's login in einfra namespace.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.MEMBERSHIPEXPIRATION_DESCRIPTION: membership expiration date decided after membership creation or extension
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.VALIDATION_LINKS_DESCRIPTION: Works only for "Mail validation / user " mail type! Used to verify email address provided by users => verify application.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.VALIDATIONLINK_DESCRIPTION: link for email address verification. Please make sure you set "Registrar URL" setting of your VO/group. If you don't specify authorization in "Registrar URL", you can use following options:
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPLICATION_LINKS_DESCRIPTION: Used to navigate users to the list of theirs applications.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPGUIURL_DESCRIPTION: link to overview of submitted registrations for users. Please make sure you set "Registrar URL" setting of your VO/group. If you don't specify authorization in "Registrar URL", you can use following options:
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPLICATION_LINKS_ADMINISTRATOR_DESCRIPT: Used to navigate administrators to the registration detail, where they can check and approve or reject the application.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.APPDETAILURL_DESCRIPTION: link to registration detail in administrative GUI. Please make sure you set "Registrar URL" setting of your VO/group. If you don't specify authorization in "Registrar URL", you can use following options:
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.PERUN_LINKS_ADMINISTRATOR_DESCRIPTION: Used to navigate administrators to the administrative GUI of Perun. Can be used for users to locate user detail too.
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.PERUNGUIURL_DESCRIPTION: link to administrative GUI. Please make sure you set "Registrar URL" setting of your VO/group. If you don't specify authorization in "Registrar URL", you can use following options:
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.USER_INVITATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Following tags can be used on user invitation template
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.USER_INVITATIONS_VONAME_DESCRIPTION: name of VO to invite user into
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.USER_INVITATIONS_GROUPNAME_DESCRIPTION: name of Group to invite user into
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.USER_INVITATIONS_MAILFOOTER_DESCRIPTION: common mail footer defined by VO
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.INVITATIONLINK_DESCRIPTION: link to registration form. Please make sure you set "Registrar URL" setting of your VO/group. If you don't specify authorization in "Registrar URL", you can use following options:
NOTIFICATIONS_ADD_EDIT_MAIL.INVALID_NOTIFICATION: Notification with selected type and selected application type already exist.

NOTIFICATIONS_COPY_MAILS.DESCRIPTION: All mail definitions will be added to yours.

CHANGE_STATUS.TITLE: Change status
CHANGE_STATUS.CHANGE_VALID:
Changing status to VALID will trigger automatic configuration for provided resources. 
If successful, member will have access on provided resources. 
If not, see displayed error message and do manual configuration on 'settings' tab on members detail.
CHANGE_STATUS.INVALID_DESCRIPTION: Member have configuration error and DON'T have access on provided resources. You can check what is wrong by changing member's status to VALID. If possible, procedure will configure all necessary settings by itself.
